abstract: Víctor Valdés i Arribas (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈβiktor βalˈdes aˈribas]; born 14 January 1982) is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for FC Barcelona in La Liga, as a goalkeeper.He is regarded as one of the best goalkeepers in Barcelona's history, appeared in more than 500 official games for his club and win 21 major titles, notably six La Liga and three UEFA Champions League championships. Valdés also has won the Zamora Trophy a record five times. He currently holds the club records as goalkeeper with most appearances in the league and in official competition, breaking Andoni Zubizarreta's records during the 2011–12 season.
